alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:47PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of showers and thunderstorms with strong gusty winds will impact portions of southwestern Madison and Beaverhead Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 546 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers with a few strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Wisdom to 15 miles southwest of Lima. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Lima, Jackson, Monida, Wisdom, Dell, Grant, Bannack Pass, Melrose, Wise River, Dewey, Bannack, Snowline, Glen, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Polaris, Clark Canyon, Bannack State Park, and Monida Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
